segment.source: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition
segment.target: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition

segment.source: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition
segment.target: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition

segment.source: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition
segment.target: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition

segment.source: After you have finished running the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard and created the recovery image, you can extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image file and deploy it as a remote partition on the network.
segment.target: After you have finished running the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard and created the recovery image, you can extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image file and deploy it as a remote partition on the network.

segment.source: To deploy DaRT as a remote partition
segment.target: To deploy DaRT as a remote partition

segment.source: Extract the boot.wim file from the DaRT ISO image file.
segment.target: Extract the boot.wim file from the DaRT ISO image file.

segment.source: Mount the ISO image file that you created in the Create Startup Image dialog box by using your company’s preferred method of mounting an image.
segment.target: Mount the ISO image file that you created in the Create Startup Image dialog box by using your company’s preferred method of mounting an image.

segment.source: Open the ISO image file and copy the boot.wim file from the sources folder in the mounted image to a location on your computer or on an external drive.
segment.target: Open the ISO image file and copy the boot.wim file from the sources folder in the mounted image to a location on your computer or on an external drive.

segment.source: If you burned a CD or DVD of the recovery image, you can open the files on the CD or DVD and copy the boot.wim file from the sources folder.
segment.target: If you burned a CD or DVD of the recovery image, you can open the files on the CD or DVD and copy the boot.wim file from the sources folder.

segment.source: This lets you skip the need to mount the image.
segment.target: This lets you skip the need to mount the image.

segment.source: Deploy the boot.wim file to a WDS server that can be accessed from end-user computers in your enterprise.
segment.target: Deploy the boot.wim file to a WDS server that can be accessed from end-user computers in your enterprise.

segment.source: Configure the WDS server to use the boot.wim file for DaRT by following your standard WDS deployment procedures.
segment.target: Configure the WDS server to use the boot.wim file for DaRT by following your standard WDS deployment procedures.

segment.source: For more information about how to deploy DaRT as a remote partition, see the following:
segment.target: For more information about how to deploy DaRT as a remote partition, see the following:

segment.source: Walkthrough: Deploy an Image by Using PXE
segment.target: Walkthrough: Deploy an Image by Using PXE

segment.source: Windows Deployment Services Getting Started Guide
segment.target: Windows Deployment Services Getting Started Guide
